summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4097 for the improvement of North and East 54th Street, from Latona Avenue to Keystone Place, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49233, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
